Kassiopeia  3
Monte Carlo simulation program specializing in tracking particles in electric and magnetic fields

10  const int KSWriteROOT::fBufferSize = 64000;
11  const int KSWriteROOT::fSplitLevel = 99;
12  const string KSWriteROOT::fLabel = string( "KASSIOPEIA_TREE_DATA" );
13 
14 
15  KSWriteROOT::Data::Data( KSComponent* aComponent ) :
16  fStructure( NULL ),
17  fLabel( "" ),
18  fType( "" ),
19  fPresence( NULL ),
20  fIndex( 0 ),
21  fLength( 0 ),
22  fData( NULL ),
23  fComponents()
24  {
25  MakeTrees( aComponent );
26  }
27  KSWriteROOT::Data::~Data()
28  {
29  delete fStructure;
30  delete fPresence;
31  delete fData;
32  }
33 
34  void KSWriteROOT::Data::Start( const unsigned int& anIndex )
35  {
36  fIndex = anIndex;
37  fLength = 0;
38  return;
39  }
40  void KSWriteROOT::Data::Fill()
41  {
42  KSComponent* tComponent;
43  vector< KSComponent* >::iterator tIt;
44 
45  for( tIt = fComponents.begin(); tIt != fComponents.end(); tIt++ )
46  {
47  tComponent = (*tIt);
48  tComponent->PullUpdate();
49  }
50 
51  fData->Fill();
52 
53  for( tIt = fComponents.begin(); tIt != fComponents.end(); tIt++ )
54  {
55  tComponent = (*tIt);
56  tComponent->PullDeupdate();
57  }
58 
59  fLength++;
60  return;
61  }
62  void KSWriteROOT::Data::Stop()
63  {
64  fPresence->Fill();
65  return;
66  }
67 
68  void KSWriteROOT::Data::MakeTrees( KSComponent* aComponent )
69  {
70  string tName = aComponent->GetName();
71 
72  string tStructureName = tName + string( "_STRUCTURE" );
73  fStructure = new TTree( tStructureName.c_str(), tStructureName.c_str() );
74  fStructure->Branch( "LABEL", &fLabel, fBufferSize, fSplitLevel );
75  fStructure->Branch( "TYPE", &fType, fBufferSize, fSplitLevel );
76 
77  string tPresenceName = tName + string( "_PRESENCE" );
78  fPresence = new TTree( tPresenceName.c_str(), tPresenceName.c_str() );
79  fPresence->Branch( "INDEX", &fIndex, fBufferSize, fSplitLevel );
80  fPresence->Branch( "LENGTH", &fLength, fBufferSize, fSplitLevel );
81 
82  string tDataName = tName + string( "_DATA" );
83  fData = new TTree( tDataName.c_str(), tDataName.c_str() );
84 
85  MakeBranches( aComponent );
86 
87  return;
88  }
89  void KSWriteROOT::Data::MakeBranches( KSComponent* aComponent )
90  {
91  wtrmsg_debug( "making branches for object <" << aComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom )
92 
93  KSComponentGroup* tComponentGroup = aComponent->As< KSComponentGroup >();
94  if( tComponentGroup != NULL )
95  {
96  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << aComponent->GetName() << "> is a group" << eom )
97  for( unsigned int tIndex = 0; tIndex < tComponentGroup->ComponentCount(); tIndex++ )
98  {
99  MakeBranches( tComponentGroup->ComponentAt( tIndex ) );
100  }
101  return;
102  }
103 
104  string* tString = aComponent->As< string >();
105  if( tString != NULL )
106  {
107  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << aComponent->GetName() << "> is a string" << eom )
108  fLabel = aComponent->GetName();
109  fType = string( "string" );
110  fStructure->Fill();
111  fData->Branch( aComponent->GetName().c_str(), tString, fBufferSize, fSplitLevel );
112  fComponents.push_back( aComponent );
113  return;
114  }
115 
116  KTwoVector* tTwoVector = aComponent->As< KTwoVector >();
117  if( tTwoVector != NULL )
118  {
119  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << aComponent->GetName() << "> is a two_vector" << eom )
120  fLabel = aComponent->GetName();
121  fType = string( "two_vector" );
122  fStructure->Fill();
123  fData->Branch( (aComponent->GetName() + string( "_x" )).c_str(), &(tTwoVector->X()), fBufferSize, fSplitLevel );
124  fData->Branch( (aComponent->GetName() + string( "_y" )).c_str(), &(tTwoVector->Y()), fBufferSize, fSplitLevel );
125  fComponents.push_back( aComponent );
126  return;
127  }
128  KThreeVector* tThreeVector = aComponent->As< KThreeVector >();
129  if( tThreeVector != NULL )
130  {
131  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << aComponent->GetName() << "> is a three_vector" << eom )
132  fLabel = aComponent->GetName();
133  fType = string( "three_vector" );
134  fStructure->Fill();
135  fData->Branch( (aComponent->GetName() + string( "_x" )).c_str(), &(tThreeVector->X()), fBufferSize, fSplitLevel );
136  fData->Branch( (aComponent->GetName() + string( "_y" )).c_str(), &(tThreeVector->Y()), fBufferSize, fSplitLevel );
137  fData->Branch( (aComponent->GetName() + string( "_z" )).c_str(), &(tThreeVector->Z()), fBufferSize, fSplitLevel );
138  fComponents.push_back( aComponent );
139  return;
140  }
141 
142  bool* tBool = aComponent->As< bool >();
143  if( tBool != NULL )
144  {
145  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << aComponent->GetName() << "> is a bool" << eom )
146  fLabel = aComponent->GetName();
147  fType = string( "bool" );
148  fStructure->Fill();
149  fData->Branch( aComponent->GetName().c_str(), tBool, fBufferSize, fSplitLevel );
150  fComponents.push_back( aComponent );
151  return;
152  }
153 
154  unsigned char* tUChar = aComponent->As< unsigned char >();
155  if( tUChar != NULL )
156  {
157  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << aComponent->GetName() << "> is an unsigned_char" << eom )
158  fLabel = aComponent->GetName();
159  fType = string( "unsigned_char" );
160  fStructure->Fill();
161  fData->Branch( aComponent->GetName().c_str(), tUChar, fBufferSize, fSplitLevel );
162  fComponents.push_back( aComponent );
163  return;
164  }
165  char* tChar = aComponent->As< char >();
166  if( tChar != NULL )
167  {
168  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << aComponent->GetName() << "> is a char" << eom )
169  fLabel = aComponent->GetName();
170  fType = string( "char" );
171  fStructure->Fill();
172  fData->Branch( aComponent->GetName().c_str(), tChar, fBufferSize, fSplitLevel );
173  fComponents.push_back( aComponent );
174  return;
175  }
176 
177  unsigned short* tUShort = aComponent->As< unsigned short >();
178  if( tUShort != NULL )
179  {
180  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << aComponent->GetName() << "> is an unsigned_short" << eom )
181  fLabel = aComponent->GetName();
182  fType = string( "unsigned_short" );
183  fStructure->Fill();
184  fData->Branch( aComponent->GetName().c_str(), tUShort, fBufferSize, fSplitLevel );
185  fComponents.push_back( aComponent );
186  return;
187  }
188  short* tShort = aComponent->As< short >();
189  if( tShort != NULL )
190  {
191  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << aComponent->GetName() << "> is a short" << eom )
192  fLabel = aComponent->GetName();
193  fType = string( "short" );
194  fStructure->Fill();
195  fData->Branch( aComponent->GetName().c_str(), tShort, fBufferSize, fSplitLevel );
196  fComponents.push_back( aComponent );
197  return;
198  }
199 
200  unsigned int* tUInt = aComponent->As< unsigned int >();
201  if( tUInt != NULL )
202  {
203  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << aComponent->GetName() << "> is a unsigned_int" << eom )
204  fLabel = aComponent->GetName();
205  fType = string( "unsigned_int" );
206  fStructure->Fill();
207  fData->Branch( aComponent->GetName().c_str(), tUInt, fBufferSize, fSplitLevel );
208  fComponents.push_back( aComponent );
209  return;
210  }
211  int* tInt = aComponent->As< int >();
212  if( tInt != NULL )
213  {
214  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << aComponent->GetName() << "> is an int" << eom )
215  fLabel = aComponent->GetName();
216  fType = string( "int" );
217  fStructure->Fill();
218  fData->Branch( aComponent->GetName().c_str(), tInt, fBufferSize, fSplitLevel );
219  fComponents.push_back( aComponent );
220  return;
221  }
222 
223  unsigned long* tULong = aComponent->As< unsigned long >();
224  if( tULong != NULL )
225  {
226  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << aComponent->GetName() << "> is an unsigned_long" << eom )
227  fLabel = aComponent->GetName();
228  fType = string( "unsigned_long" );
229  fStructure->Fill();
230  fData->Branch( aComponent->GetName().c_str(), tULong, fBufferSize, fSplitLevel );
231  fComponents.push_back( aComponent );
232  return;
233  }
234  long* tLong = aComponent->As< long >();
235  if( tLong != NULL )
236  {
237  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << aComponent->GetName() << "> is a long" << eom )
238  fLabel = aComponent->GetName();
239  fType = string( "long" );
240  fStructure->Fill();
241  fData->Branch( aComponent->GetName().c_str(), tLong, fBufferSize, fSplitLevel );
242  fComponents.push_back( aComponent );
243  return;
244  }
245  long long* tLongLong = aComponent->As< long long >();
246  if( tLongLong != NULL )
247  {
248  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << aComponent->GetName() << "> is a long long" << eom )
249  fLabel = aComponent->GetName();
250  fType = string( "long long" );
251  fStructure->Fill();
252  fData->Branch( aComponent->GetName().c_str(), tLongLong, fBufferSize, fSplitLevel );
253  fComponents.push_back( aComponent );
254  return;
255  }
256 
257  float* tFloat = aComponent->As< float >();
258  if( tFloat != NULL )
259  {
260  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << aComponent->GetName() << "> is a float" << eom )
261  fLabel = aComponent->GetName();
262  fType = string( "float" );
263  fStructure->Fill();
264  fData->Branch( aComponent->GetName().c_str(), tFloat, fBufferSize, fSplitLevel );
265  fComponents.push_back( aComponent );
266  return;
267  }
268  double* tDouble = aComponent->As< double >();
269  {
270  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << aComponent->GetName() << "> is a double" << eom )
271  fLabel = aComponent->GetName();
272  fType = string( "double" );
273  fStructure->Fill();
274  fData->Branch( aComponent->GetName().c_str(), tDouble, fBufferSize, fSplitLevel );
275  fComponents.push_back( aComponent );
276  return;
277  }
278 
279  wtrmsg( eError ) << "ROOT writer cannot add object <" << aComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom;
280 
281  return;
282  }

284  KSWriteROOT::KSWriteROOT() :
285  fBase( "" ),
286  fPath( "" ),
287  fStepIteration( 1 ),
288  fStepIterationIndex( 0 ),
289  fRunWriteConditions( 16 ),
290  fEventWriteConditions( 16 ),
291  fTrackWriteConditions( 16 ),
292  fStepWriteConditions( 16 ),
293  fFile( NULL ),
294  fRunKeys( NULL ),
295  fRunData( NULL ),
296  fRunComponents(),
297  fActiveRunComponents(),
298  fRunIndex( 0 ),
299  fRunFirstEventIndex( 0 ),
300  fRunLastEventIndex( 0 ),
301  fRunFirstTrackIndex( 0 ),
302  fRunLastTrackIndex( 0 ),
303  fRunFirstStepIndex( 0 ),
304  fRunLastStepIndex( 0 ),
305  fEventKeys( NULL ),
306  fEventData( NULL ),
307  fEventComponents(),

309  fEventIndex( 0 ),
310  fEventFirstTrackIndex( 0 ),
311  fEventLastTrackIndex( 0 ),
312  fEventFirstStepIndex( 0 ),

314  fTrackKeys( NULL ),

321  fStepComponent( false ),

375  KSWriteROOT* KSWriteROOT::Clone() const
376  {

379  KSWriteROOT::~KSWriteROOT()

383 
384  void KSWriteROOT::AddRunWriteCondition( KSWriteROOTCondition* aWriteCondition )
385  {
386  //check that write condition is not already present
387  for( int tIndex = 0; tIndex < fRunWriteConditions.End(); tIndex++ )
388  {
389  if(aWriteCondition == fRunWriteConditions.ElementAt( tIndex ) )
390  {
391  wtrmsg_debug( "<" << GetName() << "> attempted to add run write condition <" << aWriteCondition->GetName() << "> which is already present." << eom );
392  return;
393  }
394  }
395 
396  if( fRunWriteConditions.AddElement( aWriteCondition ) == -1 )
397  {
398  wtrmsg( eError ) << "<" << GetName() << "> could not add run write condition <" << aWriteCondition->GetName() << ">" << eom;
399  return;
400  }
401  wtrmsg_debug( "<" << GetName() << "> adding run write condition<" << aWriteCondition->GetName() << ">" << eom );
402  return;
403  }
404 
405  void KSWriteROOT::RemoveRunWriteCondition( KSWriteROOTCondition* aWriteCondition )
406  {
407  if( fRunWriteConditions.RemoveElement( aWriteCondition ) == -1 )
408  {
409  wtrmsg( eError ) << "<" << GetName() << "> could not remove run write condition <" << aWriteCondition->GetName() << ">" << eom;
410  return;
411  }
412  wtrmsg_debug( "<" << GetName() << "> removing run write condition <" << aWriteCondition->GetName() << ">" << eom );
413  return;
414  }
415 
416  void KSWriteROOT::AddEventWriteCondition( KSWriteROOTCondition* aWriteCondition )
417  {
418  //check that write condition is not already present
419  for( int tIndex = 0; tIndex < fEventWriteConditions.End(); tIndex++ )
420  {
421  if(aWriteCondition == fEventWriteConditions.ElementAt( tIndex ) )
422  {
423  wtrmsg_debug( "<" << GetName() << "> attempted to add event write condition <" << aWriteCondition->GetName() << "> which is already present." << eom );
424  return;
425  }
426  }
427 
428  if( fEventWriteConditions.AddElement( aWriteCondition ) == -1 )
429  {
430  wtrmsg( eError ) << "<" << GetName() << "> could not add event write condition <" << aWriteCondition->GetName() << ">" << eom;
431  return;
432  }

481  {

488  return;
489  }
490  }
491

511 
512 
513  void KSWriteROOT::ExecuteRun()
514  {
515  wtrmsg_debug( "ROOT writer <" << fName << "> is filling a run" << eom );
516 
517  if ( fEventIndex != 0 )
518  {
519  fRunLastEventIndex = fEventIndex - 1;
520  }
521  if ( fTrackIndex != 0 )
522  {
523  fRunLastTrackIndex = fTrackIndex - 1;
524  }
525  if ( fStepIndex != 0 )
526  {
527  fRunLastStepIndex = fStepIndex - 1;
528  }
529 
530  //check write condition
531  bool tWriteCondition = true;;
532  for( int tIndex = 0; tIndex < fRunWriteConditions.End(); tIndex++ )
533  {
534  bool tLocalFlag = true;
535  fRunWriteConditions.ElementAt( tIndex )->CalculateWriteCondition( tLocalFlag );
536  if ( tLocalFlag == false )
537  {
538  tWriteCondition = false;
539  break;
540  }
541  }
542 
543  if ( tWriteCondition == true )
544  {
545  for( ComponentIt tIt = fActiveRunComponents.begin(); tIt != fActiveRunComponents.end(); tIt++ )
546  {
547  tIt->second->Fill();
548  }
549  }
550  fRunData->Fill();
551 
552  fRunIndex++;
553  fRunFirstEventIndex = fEventIndex;
554  fRunFirstTrackIndex = fTrackIndex;
555  fRunFirstStepIndex = fStepIndex;
556 
557  return;
558  }
559  void KSWriteROOT::ExecuteEvent()
560  {
561  wtrmsg_debug( "ROOT writer <" << fName << "> is filling an event" << eom );
562 
563  if ( fTrackIndex != 0 )
564  {
565  fEventLastTrackIndex = fTrackIndex - 1;
566  }
567  if ( fStepIndex != 0 )
568  {
569  fEventLastStepIndex = fStepIndex - 1;
570  }
571 
572  //check write condition
573  bool tWriteCondition = true;;
574  for( int tIndex = 0; tIndex < fEventWriteConditions.End(); tIndex++ )
575  {
576  bool tLocalFlag = true;
577  fEventWriteConditions.ElementAt( tIndex )->CalculateWriteCondition( tLocalFlag );
578  if ( tLocalFlag == false )
579  {
580  tWriteCondition = false;
581  break;
582  }
583  }
584 
585  if ( tWriteCondition == true )
586  {
587  for( ComponentIt tIt = fActiveEventComponents.begin(); tIt != fActiveEventComponents.end(); tIt++ )
588  {
589  tIt->second->Fill();
590  }
591  }
592  fEventData->Fill();
593 
594  fEventIndex++;
595  fEventFirstTrackIndex = fTrackIndex;
596  fEventFirstStepIndex = fStepIndex;
597 
598  return;
599  }
600  void KSWriteROOT::ExecuteTrack()
601  {
602  wtrmsg_debug( "ROOT writer <" << fName << "> is filling a track" << eom );
603 
604  if ( fStepIndex != 0 )
605  {
606  fTrackLastStepIndex = fStepIndex - 1;
607  }
608 
609  //check write condition
610  bool tWriteCondition = true;;
611  for( int tIndex = 0; tIndex < fTrackWriteConditions.End(); tIndex++ )
612  {
613  bool tLocalFlag = true;
614  fTrackWriteConditions.ElementAt( tIndex )->CalculateWriteCondition( tLocalFlag );
615  if ( tLocalFlag == false )
616  {
617  tWriteCondition = false;
618  break;
619  }
620  }
621 
622  if( tWriteCondition == true )
623  {
624  for( ComponentIt tIt = fActiveTrackComponents.begin(); tIt != fActiveTrackComponents.end(); tIt++ )
625  {
626  tIt->second->Fill();
627  }
628  }
629  fTrackData->Fill();
630 
631  fTrackIndex++;
632  fTrackFirstStepIndex = fStepIndex;
633 
634  return;
635  }
636  void KSWriteROOT::ExecuteStep()
637  {
638  if ( fStepIterationIndex % fStepIteration != 0 )
639  {
640  wtrmsg_debug( "ROOT writer <" << fName << "> is skipping a step because of step iteration value <"<<fStepIteration<<">" << eom );
641  fStepIterationIndex++;
642  return;
643  }
644 
645  //check write condition
646  bool tWriteCondition = true;;
647  for( int tIndex = 0; tIndex < fStepWriteConditions.End(); tIndex++ )
648  {
649  bool tLocalFlag = true;
650  fStepWriteConditions.ElementAt( tIndex )->CalculateWriteCondition( tLocalFlag );
651  if ( tLocalFlag == false )
652  {
653  tWriteCondition = false;
654  break;
655  }
656  }
657 
658  if( fStepComponent == true )
659  {
660  wtrmsg_debug( "ROOT writer <" << fName << "> is filling a step" << eom );
661 
662  if ( tWriteCondition == true )
663  {
664  for( ComponentIt tIt = fActiveStepComponents.begin(); tIt != fActiveStepComponents.end(); tIt++ )
665  {
666  tIt->second->Fill();
667  }
668  }
669  fStepData->Fill();
670  }
671 
672  fStepIndex++;
673  fStepIterationIndex++;
674 
675  return;
676  }
677 
678  void KSWriteROOT::AddRunComponent( KSComponent* aComponent )
679  {
680  ComponentIt tIt = fRunComponents.find( aComponent );
681  if( tIt == fRunComponents.end() )
682  {
683  wtrmsg_debug( "ROOT writer is making a new run output called <" << aComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom );
684 
685  fFile->File()->cd();
686  fKey = aComponent->GetName();
687  fRunKeys->Fill();
688 
689  Data* tRunData = new Data( aComponent );
690  tIt = fRunComponents.insert( ComponentEntry( aComponent, tRunData ) ).first;
691  }
692 
693  wtrmsg_debug( "ROOT writer is starting a run output called <" << aComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom );
694 
695  tIt->second->Start( fRunIndex );
696  fActiveRunComponents.insert( *tIt );
697 
698  return;
699  }
700  void KSWriteROOT::RemoveRunComponent( KSComponent* aComponent )
701  {
702  ComponentIt tIt = fActiveRunComponents.find( aComponent );
703  if( tIt == fActiveRunComponents.end() )
704  {
705  wtrmsg( eError ) << "ROOT writer has no run output called <" << aComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom;
706  }
707 
708  wtrmsg_debug( "ROOT writer is stopping a run output called <" << aComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom );
709 
710  tIt->second->Stop();
711  fActiveRunComponents.erase( tIt );
712 
713  return;
714  }
715 
716  void KSWriteROOT::AddEventComponent( KSComponent* aComponent )
717  {
718  ComponentIt tIt = fEventComponents.find( aComponent );
719  if( tIt == fEventComponents.end() )
720  {
721  wtrmsg_debug( "ROOT writer is making a new event output called <" << aComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom );
722 
723  fFile->File()->cd();
724  fKey = aComponent->GetName();
725  fEventKeys->Fill();
726 
727  Data* tEventData = new Data( aComponent );
728  tIt = fEventComponents.insert( ComponentEntry( aComponent, tEventData ) ).first;
729  }
730 
731  wtrmsg_debug( "ROOT writer is starting a event output called <" << aComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom );
732 
733  tIt->second->Start( fEventIndex );
734  fActiveEventComponents.insert( *tIt );
735 
736  return;
737  }
738  void KSWriteROOT::RemoveEventComponent( KSComponent* aComponent )

741  if( tIt == fActiveEventComponents.end() )
742  {
743  wtrmsg( eError ) << "ROOT writer has no event output called <" << aComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom;
744  }

791 
792  void KSWriteROOT::AddStepComponent( KSComponent* aComponent )
793  {
794  if( fStepComponent == false )
795  {
796  fStepComponent = true;
797 
798  const unsigned int tTempStepIndex = fStepIndex;
799  for( fStepIndex = 0; fStepIndex < tTempStepIndex; ++fStepIndex )
800  {
801  fStepData->Fill();
802  }
803  fStepIndex = tTempStepIndex;
804  }
805 
806  ComponentIt tIt = fStepComponents.find( aComponent );
807  if( tIt == fStepComponents.end() )
808  {
809  wtrmsg_debug( "ROOT writer is making a new step output called <" << aComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom );
810 
811  fFile->File()->cd();
812  fKey = aComponent->GetName();
813  fStepKeys->Fill();
814 
815  Data* tStepData = new Data( aComponent );
816  tIt = fStepComponents.insert( ComponentEntry( aComponent, tStepData ) ).first;
817  }
818 
819  wtrmsg_debug( "ROOT writer is starting a step output called <" << aComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom );
820 
821  tIt->second->Start( fStepIndex );
822  fActiveStepComponents.insert( *tIt );
823 
824  return;
825  }
826  void KSWriteROOT::RemoveStepComponent( KSComponent* aComponent )
827  {
828  ComponentIt tIt = fActiveStepComponents.find( aComponent );
829  if( tIt == fActiveStepComponents.end() )
830  {
831  wtrmsg( eError ) << "ROOT writer has no step output called <" << aComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom;
832  }
833 
834  wtrmsg_debug( "ROOT writer is stopping a step output called <" << aComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom );
835 
836  tIt->second->Stop();
837  fActiveStepComponents.erase( tIt );
838 
839  return;
840  }
841 
842  void KSWriteROOT::InitializeComponent()
843  {
844  wtrmsg_debug( "starting ROOT writer" << eom );
845 
846  fFile = KRootFile::CreateOutputRootFile( fBase );
847  if( !fPath.empty() )
848  {
849  fFile->AddToPaths( fPath );
850  }
851 
852  if( fFile->Open( KFile::eWrite ) == true )
853  {
854  TObjString* tLabel = new TObjString( fLabel.c_str() );
855  tLabel->Write( "LABEL", TObject::kOverwrite );
856  fFile->File()->cd();
857  TTree::SetBranchStyle( 1 );
858 
859  fRunKeys = new TTree( "RUN_KEYS", "RUN_KEYS" );
860  fRunKeys->Branch( "KEY", &fKey, fBufferSize, fSplitLevel );
861 
862  fRunData = new TTree( "RUN_DATA", "RUN_DATA" );
863  fRunData->Branch( "RUN_INDEX", &fRunIndex, fBufferSize, fSplitLevel );
864  fRunData->Branch( "FIRST_EVENT_INDEX", &fRunFirstEventIndex, fBufferSize, fSplitLevel );
865  fRunData->Branch( "LAST_EVENT_INDEX", &fRunLastEventIndex, fBufferSize, fSplitLevel );
866  fRunData->Branch( "FIRST_TRACK_INDEX", &fRunFirstTrackIndex, fBufferSize, fSplitLevel );
867  fRunData->Branch( "LAST_TRACK_INDEX", &fRunLastTrackIndex, fBufferSize, fSplitLevel );
868  fRunData->Branch( "FIRST_STEP_INDEX", &fRunFirstStepIndex, fBufferSize, fSplitLevel );
869  fRunData->Branch( "LAST_STEP_INDEX", &fRunLastStepIndex, fBufferSize, fSplitLevel );
870 
871  fRunIndex = 0;
872  fRunFirstEventIndex = 0;
873  fRunLastEventIndex = 0;
874  fRunFirstTrackIndex = 0;
875  fRunLastTrackIndex = 0;
876  fRunFirstStepIndex = 0;
877  fRunLastStepIndex = 0;
878 
879  fEventKeys = new TTree( "EVENT_KEYS", "EVENT_KEYS" );
880  fEventKeys->Branch( "KEY", &fKey, fBufferSize, fSplitLevel );
881 
882  fEventData = new TTree( "EVENT_DATA", "EVENT_DATA" );
883  fEventData->Branch( "EVENT_INDEX", &fEventIndex, fBufferSize, fSplitLevel );
884  fEventData->Branch( "FIRST_TRACK_INDEX", &fEventFirstTrackIndex, fBufferSize, fSplitLevel );
885  fEventData->Branch( "LAST_TRACK_INDEX", &fEventLastTrackIndex, fBufferSize, fSplitLevel );
886  fEventData->Branch( "FIRST_STEP_INDEX", &fEventFirstStepIndex, fBufferSize, fSplitLevel );
887  fEventData->Branch( "LAST_STEP_INDEX", &fEventLastStepIndex, fBufferSize, fSplitLevel );
888 
889  fEventIndex = 0;
890  fEventFirstTrackIndex = 0;
891  fEventLastTrackIndex = 0;
892  fEventFirstStepIndex = 0;
893  fEventLastStepIndex = 0;
894 
895  fTrackKeys = new TTree( "TRACK_KEYS", "TRACK_KEYS" );
896  fTrackKeys->Branch( "KEY", &fKey, fBufferSize, fSplitLevel );
897 
898  fTrackData = new TTree( "TRACK_DATA", "TRACK_DATA" );
899  fTrackData->Branch( "TRACK_INDEX", &fTrackIndex, fBufferSize, fSplitLevel );
900  fTrackData->Branch( "FIRST_STEP_INDEX", &fTrackFirstStepIndex, fBufferSize, fSplitLevel );
901  fTrackData->Branch( "LAST_STEP_INDEX", &fTrackLastStepIndex, fBufferSize, fSplitLevel );
902 
903  fTrackIndex = 0;
904  fTrackFirstStepIndex = 0;
905  fTrackLastStepIndex = 0;
906 
907  fStepKeys = new TTree( "STEP_KEYS", "STEP_KEYS" );
908  fStepKeys->Branch( "KEY", &fKey, fBufferSize, fSplitLevel );
909 
910  fStepData = new TTree( "STEP_DATA", "STEP_DATA" );
911  fStepData->Branch( "STEP_INDEX", &fStepIndex, fBufferSize, fSplitLevel );
912 
913  fStepIndex = 0;
914  }
915 
916  return;
917  }
918  void KSWriteROOT::DeinitializeComponent()
919  {
920  wtrmsg_debug( "stopping ROOT writer" << eom );
921 
922  if( (fFile != NULL) && (fFile->IsOpen() == true) )
923  {
924  ComponentIt tIt;
925 
926  for( tIt = fActiveRunComponents.begin(); tIt != fActiveRunComponents.end(); tIt++ )
927  {
928  tIt->second->Stop();
929  }
930 
931  for( tIt = fActiveEventComponents.begin(); tIt != fActiveEventComponents.end(); tIt++ )
932  {
933  tIt->second->Stop();
934  }
935 
936  for( tIt = fActiveTrackComponents.begin(); tIt != fActiveTrackComponents.end(); tIt++ )
937  {
938  tIt->second->Stop();
939  }
940 
941  for( tIt = fActiveStepComponents.begin(); tIt != fActiveStepComponents.end(); tIt++ )
942  {
943  tIt->second->Stop();
944  }
945 
946  fFile->File()->Write( "", TObject::kOverwrite );
947 
948  for( tIt = fRunComponents.begin(); tIt != fRunComponents.end(); tIt++ )
949  {
950  delete tIt->second;
951  }
952 
953  for( tIt = fEventComponents.begin(); tIt != fEventComponents.end(); tIt++ )
954  {
955  delete tIt->second;
956  }
957 
958  for( tIt = fTrackComponents.begin(); tIt != fTrackComponents.end(); tIt++ )
959  {
960  delete tIt->second;
961  }
962 
963  for( tIt = fStepComponents.begin(); tIt != fStepComponents.end(); tIt++ )
964  {
965  delete tIt->second;
966  }
967 
968  fFile->Close();
969 
970  delete fFile;
971  }
972 
973  return;
974  }
975 
976  STATICINT sKSWriteROOTDict =
977  KSDictionary< KSWriteROOT >::AddCommand( &KSWriteROOT::AddRunComponent, &KSWriteROOT::RemoveRunComponent, "add_run_output", "remove_run_output" ) +
978  KSDictionary< KSWriteROOT >::AddCommand( &KSWriteROOT::AddEventComponent, &KSWriteROOT::RemoveEventComponent, "add_event_output", "remove_event_output" ) +
979  KSDictionary< KSWriteROOT >::AddCommand( &KSWriteROOT::AddTrackComponent, &KSWriteROOT::RemoveTrackComponent, "add_track_output", "remove_track_output" ) +
980  KSDictionary< KSWriteROOT >::AddCommand( &KSWriteROOT::AddStepComponent, &KSWriteROOT::RemoveStepComponent, "add_step_output", "remove_step_output" ) +
981 
982  KSDictionary< KSWriteROOT >::AddCommand( &KSWriteROOT::AddRunWriteCondition, &KSWriteROOT::RemoveRunWriteCondition, "add_run_write_condition", "remove_run_write_condition" ) +
983  KSDictionary< KSWriteROOT >::AddCommand( &KSWriteROOT::AddEventWriteCondition, &KSWriteROOT::RemoveEventWriteCondition, "add_event_write_condition", "remove_event_write_condition" ) +
984  KSDictionary< KSWriteROOT >::AddCommand( &KSWriteROOT::AddTrackWriteCondition, &KSWriteROOT::RemoveTrackWriteCondition, "add_track_write_condition", "remove_track_write_condition" ) +
985  KSDictionary< KSWriteROOT >::AddCommand( &KSWriteROOT::AddStepWriteCondition, &KSWriteROOT::RemoveStepWriteCondition, "add_step_write_condition", "remove_step_write_condition" );
986 }
